column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Terry - Thanks for the review. I'm sorry to hear of the missteps with your order. Today we introduced our new menu
column2: which includes several new items such as the Shrimp Toast. This particular tapas dish takes a little bit more time to prepare than our others tapas dishes; moreover
column3: this was the first time our line chefs were preparing the dish "under the gun
column4: as it were. Regardless, your server should have informed you at the time of the mistake, so for that I do apologize. I do hope you give us another chance to earn back some more stars, but I thank you all the same for your patronage.
